item.description:
All,

*EDIT* We have two cats who will be upstairs and can be kept separate.

We would like to invite anyone who is part of the Meetup group to our home in Salem MA on 14 Cross st #2 (second floor). We will be providing some snacks and refreshment and look forward to all who would like to attend.

We currently have for a games inventory:

Anno 1592
Scrabble
Battleship
Quarto
Redsox Yankee's Chess Set
Carcassonne Castle (2 player version)
Abalone
Cranium Turbo
Monopoly
Cribbage
Chinese Checkers
Clue
Cards

If anyone would like to play a game they own, please feel free to bring it along, as we can have 16 people and we hope multiple games could be played at one time among our guests.

Thank you for the great time we had last Friday David and Liv, hope to see more of the group on the 6th!

I&B

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Midoctober Night Games
